CustomField.formula: IF(FIND('.', TEXT(Apttus_Approval__StepSequence__c)) = 2, LEFT(TEXT(Apttus_Approval__StepSequence__c), FIND('.', TEXT(Apttus_Approval__StepSequence__c))) + TEXT(VALUE(RIGHT(RPAD(TEXT(Apttus_Approval__StepSequence__c), 5, '0'), 3))), LEFT(TEXT(Apttus_Approval__StepSequence__c), FIND('.', TEXT(Apttus_Approval__StepSequence__c))) + TEXT(VALUE(RIGHT(RPAD(TEXT(Apttus_Approval__StepSequence__c), 6, '0'), 3))))
CustomField.label: Sequence
